content: अपाच्, अपांच् ({%<ab>m.</ab>%}|ङ्|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}|ची|{%<ab>n.</ab>%}|क्) [अपांचति, अंच् क्विप्] {@--1@} Going or situated backwards, behind. {@--2@} Not open or clear (अप्रकाश). {@--3@} Western. {@--4@} Southern (<ab>opp.</ab> उदंच्); probably for अवांच्. --क् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Behind, backwards. {@--2@} Westward or southward.
